channel.title: Changing the name of an item and changing the word under the skull
channel.description: how do i change the name of an item and how do i change the word under the skull and also how do i change what the screen when u first login says :) thanx[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 10:11:01 AM[/size][hr]can anyone help with this?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 01:54:54 PM[/size][hr]someone must beable to...

item.title: Changing the name of an item and changing the word under the skull
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Irl1 Owned Irl
item.description:
@Owned_Irl1 wrote:

for the skull…

search for pimp in client.java

search it until you find this code @cya@pimp

or if u have a source with danger!

search for @red@danger!

change the dager or pimp to an abreviation of your server name or whatever you want…

Changing items names, i havent seen anything on that… Unless you create ur own client… not sure about that

Read full topic
